I'm trying to draw a graph formed of vertices and edges joining them, and I need to place some text beside each edge so that if I move any vertex at the run time, the text stays in the right place according to the edge.

In other words, what I'm trying to do is somehow like the following,

      (text1)          (text2)
v1 ----------> v2 ----------> v3

 

Hope I made my idea clear enough.
You should modify the controltemplate of the edge. Positioning of the edge labels is not implemented in the framework, it's your job to do.
